content: deutsch unten for **swiss crocheters** get the required yarn here 1 as a bundle at our shop yarni chain 2 **description** the crocheted button-up shirt is a simple buttoned mesh shirt using two large granny square hexagons to form the two halves of the shirt which are then connected in the back and at the shoulders the instructions in the pattern includes lots of pictures and step-by-step instructions **sizing** the pattern is made to measure and easily adjustable to your individual size the pattern includes instructions on how to adjust the row and stitch counts to match your measurements the sample is made in a size equivalent to women s street size s-m in a loose fit **yarn approximations** the following are the approximate amounts of skeins of each color of lang yarns soft cotton 3 required off-white/melone/orange/gold s-m 6/1/1/2 m-l 8/1/1/2 l-xl 9/2/2/3 xl-xxl 11/2/2/4 **note ** this is a free community based pattern that has not been tested these approximations stem from rough calculations and feedback from people who made the pattern which is why only a very limited size spectrum is covered please let us know if you made another size for which we may list the quantities **gauge** to swatch your gauge follow steps 1-8 of the pattern using a 3mm hook until your hexagon is 4r wide at this point your hexagon should measure 10 cm across **notions** * 5 buttons diameter 15mm * darning needle small enough to fit through button * measuring tape this pattern was created on commission for yarni chain by chiara bono 4 of craftychiara dass sie an die eigenen masse angepasst werden soll das vorgehen ist in der anleitung beschrieben damit klar ist wie man die anleitung an die eigenen masse angleichen kann das beispielhemd wurde in frauengrösse s-m gemacht und hat einen weiten schnitt **garn mengen** die ungefähren mengen pro grösse und farbe sind wie folgt für lang yarns soft cotton 6 in den farben off-white/melone/orange/gold unser sampel getestet die mengenempfehlungen oben stammen aus berechnungen und rückmeldungen von jenen die das häkelhemd bereits gehäkelt haben weshalb nur ungefähre mengen für wenige grössen
